channel.title: Totally spawn + command
channel.description:
Hello guys, i wan't to change one thing in my server, i have a server, a normal server,tha you train to get skill up,and kill monster to get items, but i don't know how to.can anyone teach me? (some items you can't spawn,you need to donate for it)
and what is the command to add "master" and "pure" anyone know?

item.title: Totally spawn + command
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

Your command is under the section of Admins.
Just move it to the player section. (Cut it and post it somewhere below, at the bottom.)

Read full topic

item.title: Totally spawn + command
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Oh i read it weong then change the player rights from 3 to 1
If u can’t figure it out post the command here

Read full topic

item.title: Totally spawn + command
item.dc:creator: @maikiew maikiew
item.description:
@maikiew wrote:

spawn npcs? wtf lol
i wan’t to make my server total spawnable
look i have a server, a normal one, eco server,you train for your items,but i wan’t to change that, i wan’t to make it full spawn. a PVP server. i have a command named “item” but only me can spawn,and i wan’t to change that to all players can spawn.
and iwan’t to make it so you can’t spawn some items like torva,pernix,virtus,vesta,chaotics etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Totally spawn + command

item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

For those xp commands check my tutorial of pi base coding.
For spawning npcs u must go in spawn-config.cfg
